{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking for the drug of choice for non-penicillinase producing staphylococcus. Penicillinase is an enzyme that some bacteria produce to inactivate penicillin antibiotics, making them resistant. Non-penicillinase producing staphylococcus, therefore, would not have this resistance. According to Document [0], Penicillin G is the most effective penicillin against non-penicillinase-producing staphylococci.", "answer_choice": "C. Penicillin G"}
